quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Ugly Betty and Series
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, offers, actor. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: On the show Ugly Betty, what is the name of the employee at Mode, who wants Bettys job?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Amanda

questions.question: Where does fictional character Homer Simpson work?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Nuclear Power Plant

questions.question: In the animated series The Simpsons, Homer and Marges children are named Maggie, Lisa, and Bart.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: For a short time Bettys boyfriend on Ugly Betty dumps her for another neighbor. Why does the neighbor want to be with him?

options.text: To get a good deal on a plasma TV
To get a good deal on an airplane ticket

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: To get a good deal on a plasma TV

questions.question: Where in New York City does Betty live in the popular TV series Ugly Betty?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jackson Heights, Queens

questions.question: In the TV series Ugly Betty, Daniels father cheated on Daniels mother with a former model for Mode. What identical gift did he give to both his wife and mistress?

options.text: A copy of The Mona Lisa

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A Swiss-made music box

questions.question: In the TV series Ugly Betty, Wilhemina offers Betty a check for  $20,000. What does Betty need the money for?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A lawyer

questions.question: In the last episode of Ugly Betty for 2006, Bettys family Christmas celebration is interrupted by something terrible. What is it?

options.text: Her father is rushed to the hospital.
Her boss has lost  the book.
Her sister is rushed to the hospital.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Her father is arrested.

questions.question: Who was framed by Sideshow Bob on The Simpsons?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Krusty

questions.question: Bart and Milhouse from the animated show The Simpsons are friends.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: This actor, who was in Zoot Suit, An Officer and a Gentleman, and the great Spanish-language movie El Norte, plays Bettys father, Ignacio on the show Ugly Betty.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tony Plana

questions.question: Where do The Simpsons live on the popular show of the same name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Springfield

questions.question: Who portrays Wilhemina, the villainous rival for the position of editor of Mode Magazine in the series Ugly Betty?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Vaness L. Williams

questions.question: Who portrays Walter, Bettys boyfriend on the show Ugly Betty?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kevin Sussman

questions.question: Bettys father on the show Ugly Betty left Mexico and never applied for US citizenship. Why?

options.text: He owed money to his patron in La Puebla.
He killed a man in Mexico.
He had a criminal record in Vera Cruz.
He ran away from jail in Mexico.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He killed a man in Mexico.

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Episode and Maude
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, reptile, opening. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Norman Lear, the producer of All in the Family, originally wanted Phyllis Diller to play the part of Maude. Unfortunately she was too busy with her Vegas Show.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: In the Buffy episode Reptile Boy, Buffy and Willow are offered as a sacrifice to a reptile god.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Who lives next door to the Simpsons on the popular animated show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ned Flanders

questions.question: In the Buffy the Vampire Slayer episode Halloween, this man performs the spell that makes everyone wearing one of his Halloween costumes take on the personality of whatever they are dressed as.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ethan Rayne

questions.question: Xander and Willow kissed in the opening episode of season 2 of Buffy the Vampire Slayer.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: In the opening episode of season 2 of Buffy the Vampire Slayer, When She Was Bad, its been a quiet summer in Sunnydale with very little vampire activity.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In the episode of Buffy the Vampire Slayer, When She Was Bad, what dastardly deed is the Anointed One trying to accomplish?

options.text: Create a spell to weaken Buffy

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bring back the master

questions.question: In what year did the TV show Maude come to an end?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1978

questions.question: At the end of the series Maude, Maude ran for political office and won. What office did she win?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Congresswoman

questions.question: How many Emmys did Maude win during its run?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1

questions.question: In the Buffy episode Lie to Me an old friend of Buffys arrives in Sunnydale. What is his name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Billy Fordham

questions.question: In the Buffy episode Inca Mummy Girl, Xander falls for a foreign exchange student. What was her name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ampata

questions.question: Buffy the Vampire Slayer episode School Hard features the first appearance of the vampires Spike and his girlfriend Drusilla.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Maude, from the self-titled show, had a housekeeper named Florida who went on to get her own show. What was the name of that show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Good Times

questions.question: In the episode The Dark Age from the Buffy the Vampire Slayer series, Ethan Rayne returns. By what name does he refer to Giles?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ripper

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Episode and Buffy
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, surprise, vampire. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In the episode Surprise Buffy the Vampire Slayer is celebrating which birthday?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 17th

questions.question: How does Buffy destroy The Judge in the Buffy the Vampire Slayer episode Innocence?

options.text: She stabs him with Kendras favorite stake Mr. Pointy.
She bores him to death with her whining.
She blows him up with a rocket launcher.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She blows him up with a rocket launcher.

questions.question: What happens to Oz in the episode Phases of Buffy the Vampire Slayer?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He becomes a werewolf.

questions.question: In the Buffy episode Becoming, Part Two, Drusilla teams up with Buffy to stop Angelus.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Buffy loses her virginity in the episode Surprise in the second season of Buffy the Vampire Slayer.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Who dies in the episode Becoming, Part One from the second season of Buffy the Vampire Slayer?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kendra

questions.question: In the Buffy episode Whats My Line, (parts 1  2) a new slayer arrives in town.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In the second season of Buffy the Vampire Slayer, as a result of having sex with Buffy, Angel loses his soul.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In the episode Go Fish from the second season of Buffy the Vampire Slayer, who goes undercover on the swim team to find out why swimmers have been mysteriously disappearing?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Xander

questions.question: Xander hardboiled his son and almost ate him in an episode of the second season of Buffy the Vampire Slayer.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In the episode of Buffy the Vampire Slayer called Bad Eggs, the kids have to take care of eggs as though they were children.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In the Buffy episode Bewitched, Bothered and Bewildered, after Cordelia breaks up with him, Xander has Amy (last seen in the episode The Witch in season 1) cast a spell to make her love him again.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In the last episode of the second season of Buffy the Vampire Slayer, Buffy leaves town after stopping Angelus.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In the Buffy episode I Only Have Eyes for You, Buffy and Angel are both possessed by ghosts.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Which character dies in the Buffy the Vampire Slayer episode Passion?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jenny

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Family Guy and Peter
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, stream, salmon. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What do Bill Clinton and Peter DONT do together in the Family Guy episode Bill and Peters Bogus Journey?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Eat a pig

questions.question: What TV star does Meg worship in the Family Guy episode The Story on Page One?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Luke Perry

questions.question: Complete this line from Family Guy and name the character who delivered it: Um, you know feel free to say no to this but ...

options.text: would you pet my coin purse? Peter
would you mind shaving my coin purse? Stewie
would you scratch my coin purse? Brian
would you tickle my coin purse? Chris

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: would you mind shaving my coin purse? Stewie

questions.question: What happens to Chris when he spawns up the stream like a salmon on the TV show Family Guy?

options.text: He ends up out of the water and suffocates.
He gets caught by a fisherman.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A bear catches him.

questions.question: In an episode of Family Guy, Peter accused his doctor of molesting him when undergoing this type of medical test.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Prostate Exam

questions.question: What was Family Guy character Mr. Weed wearing in the kitchen in the episode in which he was invited to the Griffins house for dinner?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: white underwear

questions.question: When did the show Hawaii Five-O first air on TV?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 9/20/1968-4/26/1980

questions.question: What did Peter discover in his back yard in the Family Guy episode Petergiest?

options.text: a long lost Shakespeare sonnet book

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: an Indian skull

questions.question: On the TV show Family Guy, what did Stewie have Brian write about when he thought he was about to die from cancer?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a squiggly line

questions.question: What does Peter offer to Lois when he worked as a hooker on the TV show Family Guy?

options.text: a BJ for 2 nights at Caesars in Vegas

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a Cleveland steamer

questions.question: How did Peter, the protagonist of Family Guy, meet Brian?

options.text: Brian was cleaning Peters windshield for money.
The former neighbors left Brian behind when they moved.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Brian was cleaning Peters windshield for money.

questions.question: Finish this Family Guy quote: Holy crip, hes a ______.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: crapple

questions.question: Lois is playing the piano at the beginning of the Family Guy theme song.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In an episode of the TV show Family Guy, Brian caught Meg kissing the TV screen. Whose image was she kissing?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tom Tucker

questions.question: Where did Peter pretend to be deaf in the animated sitcom Family Guy?

options.text: He has never pretended to be deaf.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: at the airport

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Jack Lord and Series
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, portray, tv. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Which TV series imitates Hawaii Five-O by having the Police Chief often say, Bookem, Lou?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Simpsons

questions.question: From the  age of  15 Jack Lord was able to travel to many far-off places. How did he do this?

options.text: His parents had a home on the Mediterranean.
He enlisted in the Navy with a false birth certificate.
He enlisted in the Merchant Marine.
His grandfather owned homes in Asia, Africa, and Australia.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He enlisted in the Merchant Marine.

questions.question: Whom did Jack Lord portray on the show Hawaii Five-O?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Steve McGarrett

questions.question: Before joining the police department what was McGarretts job in the TV series Hawaii Five-O?

options.text: Intelligence officer in the US Navy

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Intelligence officer in the US Navy

questions.question: In the series Hawaii Five-O, McGarrett often had the ear of the Hawaiian Attorney General. What was his  name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: John Manicote

questions.question: Who created the show Hawaii Five-O?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Leonard Freeman

questions.question: In real life, what piece of clothing was Jack Lord famous for wearing?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Panama hats

questions.question: Where did Jack Lord study acting?

options.text: The Actors Studio in New York
The Uta Hagen School of  Acting in Chicago

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Actors Studio in New York

questions.question: When did Jack Lord live?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 12/30/1920-1/21/1998

questions.question: What was the name of the governor in the show Hawaii Five-O?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Paul Jameson

questions.question: From which University did Jack Lord graduate?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: NYU

questions.question: In the show The A-Team, what member of the team sometimes works as an actor, playing monsters in low-budget horror movies?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hannibal

questions.question: Where were the interior scenes for the show Hawaii Five-O shot?

options.text: At the CBS lot in Studio City, California
In a hangar at the Honolulu airport
In the Capitol Building in Honolulu, Hawaii

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: In a hangar at the Honolulu airport

questions.question: What was the name of the second-in-command at Five-O ?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Danny Williams

questions.question: What was the name of the main criminal in the series Hawaii Five-O, played by the American actor Khigh Dheigh?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Wo Fat

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Series and Character
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, john, genius. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What is the name of Johnny Bravos little neighbour, who is always popping up at the worst times?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Little Suzy

questions.question: In the A-Team action series, B.A. stands for both Bad Attitude and B.A.s real name, which is what?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bosco Albert

questions.question: Wayne and Lucien, from this cartoon series, are closely related but hate each others guts.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Cramp Twins

questions.question: What team member is the good-looking, smooth-talking Ladies Man in the A-Team show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Face

questions.question: In the A-Team action series, what character is so terrified of flying that the rest of the team members must drug him and load him onto the plane?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: B.A.

questions.question: What are the names of the two characters who are best friends with the Grim Reaper?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Billy and Mandy

questions.question: The character from Courage the Cowardly Dog is very devoted to his beloved owner, Muriel.  What is the name of Muriels husband?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Eustace

questions.question: How many are the chief characters of Codename:Kids Next Door, who have numbers instead of names?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 5

questions.question: In order to promote the WWF (World Wrestling Federation), Hulk Hogan appeared in the A-Team series several times.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: I.M. Weasel is a genius and a hero, who was created by his not-so-clever counterpart, I.R. What type of animal is I.R.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Baboon

questions.question: Col. John Hannibal Smith is played by what Breakfast at Tiffanys actor in the A-Team action series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: George Peppard

questions.question: What is the missing part from the voiceover intro to the A-Team show: Ten years ago, a crack commando unit was sent to prison by a military court for __________.?

options.text: the murder of a fellow officer.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a crime they didnt commit.

questions.question: In one episode of The A-Team, Murdock appears on the show Wheel of Fortune but doesnt win.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: What character from the actions series A-Team goes by the names Templeton Peck,  Al Peck, Templeton Arthur Peck, Alvin Brennar, Al Brennan, Holmes Morrison, Morrison Holmes, and Richard Bancroft?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Face

questions.question: What character, often called a crazy fool, must the A-Team routinely break out of a mental hospital in the The A-Team series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Murdock
